dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
L. V. Gool
C. K. I. Williams
J. Winn
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: The PASCAL VOC 2012 dataset is used for category-level object segmentation, consisting of train, val, and test partitions with about 1450 images each. It provides ground-truth segmentations for various object categories.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC 2012
